info.title: YellowAPI™ Deals API
info.description:
Test our API services using I/O Docs. YellowAPI™ Deals API lets you find deals near you or for a business listing from the Places API. Note that the IO Docs require the use of sandbox keys* and using deals.sandbox.yellowapi.com domain.

All Deals API response are only available in JSON format.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Find deals with a keyword given a geocode. Formerl...
get.description: Find deals with a keyword given a geocode. Formerly known as FindDeals

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword search term. This may be keywords, business names, or products

parameters.name: categories_list[]
parameters.description: Category to include in the search. This list can be retried from categories API call. Multiple categories can be specified by repeating this parameter for each value.

parameters.name: content_types_list[]
parameters.description: Content types to include in the search. This list can be retried from content-types API call. Multiple content types can be specified by repeating this parameter for each value.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude coordinate. This value must be in WGS84 degress decimal notation.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude coordinate. This value must be in WGS84 degress decimal notation.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Return results from witin the radius (in KM) from centroid.

parameters.name: pg
parameters.description: The requested page

parameters.name: pgLen
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of deal (Values: deal, coupon, deal coupon)

parameters.name: sflag
parameters.description: Limit results to elements with certain content types such as pictures (Values: fto for pictures)

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Set the language for the response. Permitted values are en or fr

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)

get.summary: Get details for a specific deal. Formerly GetDealD...
get.description: Get details for a specific deal. Formerly GetDealDetails

parameters.name: deal_id
parameters.description: Deal ID returned from Places or Deals API

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Deal language filter (Values: EN or FR)

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)

get.summary: Get the list of category ID and their English/Fren...
get.description: Get the list of category ID and their English/French names. These IDs correspond to the main_cateogry_id element in the search responses. Note that this call may be cached for up to 1 hour.

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)

get.summary: Get the list of content types and their English/Fr...
get.description: Get the list of content types and their English/French names. These IDs correspond to the content_type_id element in the deal responses. Note that this call may be cached for up to 1 hour.

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)
